AcceptInvitation.name: AcceptInvitation
AcceptInvitation.description: Grants permission to accept an invitation to become a member of a behavior graph

BatchGetGraphMemberDatasources.name: BatchGetGraphMemberDatasources
BatchGetGraphMemberDatasources.description: Grants permission to retrieve the datasource package history for the specified member accounts in a behavior graph managed by this account

BatchGetMembershipDatasources.name: BatchGetMembershipDatasources
BatchGetMembershipDatasources.description: Grants permission to retrieve the datasource package history of the caller account for the specified graphs

CreateGraph.name: CreateGraph
CreateGraph.description: Grants permission to create a behavior graph and begin to aggregate security information

CreateMembers.name: CreateMembers
CreateMembers.description: Grants permission to request the membership of one or more accounts in a behavior graph managed by this account

DeleteGraph.name: DeleteGraph
DeleteGraph.description: Grants permission to delete a behavior graph and stop aggregating security information

DeleteMembers.name: DeleteMembers
DeleteMembers.description: Grants permission to remove member accounts from a behavior graph managed by this account

DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to view the current configuration related to the Amazon Detective integration with AWS Organizations

DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to remove the Amazon Detective delegated administrator account for an organization

DisassociateMembership.name: DisassociateMembership
DisassociateMembership.description: Grants permission to remove the association of this account with a behavior graph

EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to designate the Amazon Detective delegated administrator account for an organization

GetFreeTrialEligibility.name: GetFreeTrialEligibility
GetFreeTrialEligibility.description: Grants permission to retrieve a behavior graph's eligibility for a free trial period

GetGraphIngestState.name: GetGraphIngestState
GetGraphIngestState.description: Grants permission to retrieve the data ingestion state of a behavior graph

GetInvestigation.name: GetInvestigation
GetInvestigation.description: Grants permission to get an investigation's status and metadata

GetMembers.name: GetMembers
GetMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on specified members of a behavior graph

GetPricingInformation.name: GetPricingInformation
GetPricingInformation.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Amazon Detective's pricing

GetUsageInformation.name: GetUsageInformation
GetUsageInformation.description: Grants permission to list usage information of a behavior graph

InvokeAssistant.name: InvokeAssistant
InvokeAssistant.description: Grants permission to invoke Detective's Assistant

ListDatasourcePackages.name: ListDatasourcePackages
ListDatasourcePackages.description: Grants permission to list a graph's datasource package ingest states and timestamps for the most recent state changes in a behavior graph managed by this account

ListGraphs.name: ListGraphs
ListGraphs.description: Grants permission to list behavior graphs managed by this account

ListHighDegreeEntities.name: ListHighDegreeEntities
ListHighDegreeEntities.description: Grants permission to retrieve high volume entities whose relationships cannot be stored by Detective

ListIndicators.name: ListIndicators
ListIndicators.description: Grants permission to list the indicators of an investigation

ListInvestigations.name: ListInvestigations
ListInvestigations.description: Grants permission to list the investigations of a behavior graph

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on the behavior graphs to which this account has been invited to join

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on all members of a behavior graph

ListOrganizationAdminAccount.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccount
ListOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to view the current Amazon Detective delegated administrator account for an organization

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tag values that are assigned to a behavior graph

RejectInvitation.name: RejectInvitation
RejectInvitation.description: Grants permission to reject an invitation to become a member of a behavior graph

SearchGraph.name: SearchGraph
SearchGraph.description: Grants permission to search the data stored in a behavior graph

StartMonitoringMember.name: StartMonitoringMember
StartMonitoringMember.description: Grants permission to start data ingest for a member account that has a status of ACCEPTED_BUT_DISABLED

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to assign tag values to a behavior graph

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tag values from a behavior graph

UpdateDatasourcePackages.name: UpdateDatasourcePackages
UpdateDatasourcePackages.description: Grants permission to enable or disable datasource package(s) in a behavior graph managed by this account

UpdateInvestigationState.name: UpdateInvestigationState
UpdateInvestigationState.description: Grants permission to update an investigation's state and metadata

UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the current configuration related to the Amazon Detective integration with AWS Organizations
